lead: Big Tech's influence continues to reshape politics and technology in 2026.

stories.title: One year in, Big Tech has out-maneuvered MAGA populists
stories.summary: As Big Tech leaders continue to navigate the political landscape, their influence over the Trump administration has become increasingly evident, showcasing a significant shift in power dynamics.

stories.title: Elon Musk Makes Part of X Algorithm Open Source, Says It ‘Sucks’
stories.summary: Elon Musk's decision to open source part of the X algorithm reflects ongoing transparency efforts, despite his candid admission about its shortcomings.

stories.title: Netflix to redesign its app as it competes with social platforms for daily engagement
stories.summary: In a bid to enhance user engagement, Netflix plans to integrate vertical video feeds into its app, adapting to the competitive landscape of social media.

stories.title: Bolna nabs $6.3M from General Catalyst for its India-focused voice orchestration platform
stories.summary: Bolna's recent funding round highlights the growing demand for voice technology solutions in India, with a significant portion of its revenue coming from self-serve customers.

stories.title: Sony and TCL are teaming up to make your next TV, and it's a bigger deal than you think
stories.summary: The partnership between Sony and TCL marks a strategic shift in the TV market, with TCL set to take control of Sony's TV division by 2027.
